page.title: 20Trade
page.content: The 2 village shops stock many items but this area relies heavily on goods being delivered to the door either daily, weekly or on request. Mobile tradesmen play an important social role often providing a vital contact with the outside world for the elderly or housebound. If door-step milk deliveries cease because of E.C.C. rules it will end this daily contact.Rising fuel costs have already stopped some services. Bakers, milkmen and green grocers sell a variety of other goods. Other services include laundry, farrier, hairdresser amd mobile county library van. Bells signal the arrival of the fish and chip or ice cream vans. Declining public transport makes travelling tradesmen essential to rural life.
